territoryToday.markdown:
# Italy Today

Italy is a country in Europe. It is the fifth largest country in Europe by area and the third most populous country in Europe. Italy is a member of the European Union and the Eurozone.

territoryHistory.markdown:
# Italy History

Italy has a long and rich history. It is the birthplace of the Roman Empire and the Renaissance. Italy is a member of the European Union and the Eurozone.

localityToday.markdown:
# Rome Today

Rome is the capital of Italy. It is a city of history and culture. Rome is a member of the European Union and the Eurozone.

localityHistory.markdown:
# Rome History

Rome has a long and rich history. It is the birthplace of the Roman Empire and the Renaissance. Rome is a member of the European Union and the Eurozone.

regionalCuisine.markdown: A taste of regional dishes from the area.

cards.description: Shakshuka is a dish of eggs cooked in a sauce of tomatoes, onions, and garlic.
Moussaka is a dish of eggplant, potatoes, and ground beef.
